description: The 27-year-old was taken to hospital and the dog to a vet for treatment following the incident.
title: Man arrested after police dog injured
title_page: Man arrested after police dog injured in Aberdeen - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested after a police dog was injured in Aberdeen.
Officers along with the canine unit responded to reports of a man in possession of a knife on Seaforth Road in the city at about 16:50 on Friday.
The 27-year-old was arrested, but a police dog was injured during the operation.
The dog was taken to a vet for treatment, while the man was transported to hospital.
